reviews.customers_say: Customers find the tunic fits nicely and appreciate its softness, comfort, and lightweight design that works well year-round.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this top!
items.body: Love this top. Just bought my 3rd one but got a size smaller as Iâ€™ve lost a few pounds. Fits perfectly but arms are long which is always my issue. The feel is soft inside and somewhat like a cuddle duds feelâ€”very cozy! But not hot. The Burgundy Red is GORGEOUS and pretty vivid compared to the other colors I got. Be warned the inside of the burgundy red is slightly different than the other colors, more of a smooth feel than fuzzy cozy feel, and the rib design is different, but itâ€™s lovely. Great quality for the price and washes perfectly! Would love other styles in this same fabric. Read more
items.author: whybrown

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, fits great, looks great!
items.body: This is the perfect sweater for postpartum ladies wanting something nice that isnâ€™t too tight. Itâ€™s soft and comfortable and flowy while allowing room for some of those fluffy parts. I just ordered it in another color and will probably order 2 or 3 more. Durable in the wash too! No pilling so far! The cream color is slightly see-through, but I just wear a tank underneath. Read more
items.author: Danielle

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for those chilly fall nights.
items.body: The shirt itself is beautiful, very soft, very comfortable. I purchased a large and have a 38 D bra size. Plenty of room to move. Itâ€™s not baggie, itâ€™s not form fitting, itâ€™s a swing style and fits nicely. I ordered 3 of these not sure WHY, each one from this SAME company, all the SAME size, IN 3 different colors were priced differently- 9.99, 12.99 & 14.99. All came from the same place. This green one came INSIDE OUT! It was CLEARLY WORN OR TRIED ON. Sent to me rolled up in a zip lock bag not sealed, tossed inside another bag that was sealed. I will be contacting the seller/company for answers on the pricing. I wanted them for a trip and didnâ€™t have the time to contact ahead of time. Hopefully they reimburse me or credit me and Iâ€™ll get yet another. The quality for the price is acceptable. Read more
items.author: Pflan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and versatile staple piece
items.body: This is a comfortable, basic sweater that is versatile. You can wear it easily with jeans, boots or booties, and casual jewelry; or dress it up just as easily with nicer pants and heels/dressier shoes, and jewelry. Basic black piece that can be work throughtout fall and winter in a variety of ways makes it a great closet staple. I bought it in 2 colors, black, and the red. True to size, doesn't cling but it does hang very nicely. Read more
items.author: aarcurly123

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have
items.body: Very comfy and soft. Fit true to size. In a weight loss journey and needed new tips without spending too much. Great quality and price. Read more
items.author: Darlene Cooley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daloogoe long sleeve shirt.
items.body: Fits good, looks great. I have orders a couple. Nice and soft material. ðŸ¥°ðŸ¥° Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Soft, Flattering, and Perfect for Everyday Wear!
items.body: I ordered the Saloogoe long sleeve shirt in both black and caramel, and Iâ€™m so glad I did! The fabric is buttery soft and lightweight but still has a nice thickness to it â€” not see-through at all. It feels super comfy against the skin and drapes beautifully without clinging. The fit is just right â€” relaxed but still flattering â€” and the length is perfect for wearing with leggings or jeans. The black one is a closet staple, and the caramel color is gorgeous in person, really warm and rich. Iâ€™ve washed them both a few times and theyâ€™ve held up great â€” no shrinking or fading. These shirts are perfect for layering, lounging, or dressing up a bit with accessories. Iâ€™ll definitely be ordering more colors! Highly recommend for anyone looking for a comfy, stylish everyday top. Read more
items.author: Chelsey

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater , needs to be thicker
items.body: Nice sweater ! Wish it was a bit thicker , very thin but soft and comfortable! Great with leggings Read more
items.author: Misfit

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Color Block(blue-grey), Brown, Steelblue, Dark Grey, Fuchsia, Apricot, Color Block(black-apricot), Black, Coffee, Orange, Turquoise Blue, Color Block(coffee-apricot), Color Block(caramel-apricot), Haze Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
